amendatorysection.catchline: Register of deeds; county clerk; fees.
amendatorysection.para: The register of deeds and the county clerk shall receive for recording a deed, mortgage, or release, recording and indexing of a will, recording and indexing of a decree in a testate estate, recording proof of publication, or recording any other instrument, a fee of five dollars per page. The cost for a certified copy of any instrument filed or recorded in the office of county clerk or register of deeds shall be one dollar and fifty cents per page.

annotation.para: The county clerk of a county under township organization is not entitled to any compensation for making a duplicate tax list. Radford v. Dixon County, 29 Neb. 113, 45 N.W. 275 (1890).
